summary: This is a voluntary interview waiver form from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General. It documents that an employee named Joseph Miller is voluntarily providing information as part of an OIG investigation, with warnings about the use of statements in future proceedings.

persons.name: Joseph Miller
persons.context: Employee of the Department of Justice who is voluntarily providing information as part of an Office of the Inspector General investigation.

keyFacts: The document is a voluntary interview waiver form from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General.
An employee named Joseph Miller is voluntarily providing information as part of an OIG investigation.
The form includes warnings that statements may be used in future criminal or disciplinary proceedings.
The investigation is being conducted pursuant to the Inspector General Act of 1978.
The form indicates no promises, threats, pressure, or coercion were used against the employee.
